```{r}
#Getting data from API
df <- httr::GET("https://rstudio-connect.business.utah.edu/content/260/data") %>% 
    httr::content()
df
```

```{r}
#Writing a csv file using the data from the API
write.csv(df, file = "dataindeed.csv")
```

